GlobalVar.Name: _CommandLineArgs
GlobalVar.Hint: The command line arguments passed to the setup/uninstall.

GlobalVar.Name: _DesktopFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The per-user desktop folder.

GlobalVar.Name: _DesktopFolderCommon
GlobalVar.Hint: The system's common desktop folder.

GlobalVar.Name: _DisableCloseButton
GlobalVar.Hint: Whether the close button (X) will be enabled on screens at runtime.

GlobalVar.Name: _DoingUninstall
GlobalVar.Hint: Whether the setup is currently uninstalling.

GlobalVar.Name: _InstallStages
GlobalVar.Hint: A table which can be used to turn install stages off.

GlobalVar.Name: _IR_ProductID
GlobalVar.Hint: The Indigo Rose product ID of the currently running runtime.

GlobalVar.Name: _NeedsReboot
GlobalVar.Hint: Whether the setup/uninstall needs to reboot in order to complete.

GlobalVar.Name: _ProgramFilesFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The system's program files folder.

GlobalVar.Name: _ProgramFilesFolder64
GlobalVar.Hint: On 64-bit systems this is the 64-bit program files folder. Equal to _ProgramFilesFolder on 32-bit systems.

GlobalVar.Name: _SilentInstall
GlobalVar.Hint: Whether the setup is running in silent mode.

GlobalVar.Name: _SourceDrive
GlobalVar.Hint: The drive that the setup/uninstall is being run from.

GlobalVar.Name: _SourceFilename
GlobalVar.Hint: The full path and filename to the setup/uninstall executable that is running.

GlobalVar.Name: _SourceFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The folder that the setup/uninstall is being run from.

GlobalVar.Name: _SuppressUninstallDataDuplicateCheck
GlobalVar.Hint: Whether to suppress duplicate file checking when writing out file data to the uninstall configuration file.

GlobalVar.Name: _SystemFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The system's windows system folder.

GlobalVar.Name: _tblErrorMessages
GlobalVar.Hint: The error messages table.

GlobalVar.Name: _TempFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The system's temporary folder.

GlobalVar.Name: _TempLaunchFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The setup's temporary launch folder.

GlobalVar.Name: _UninstallStages
GlobalVar.Hint: A table which can be used to turn uninstall stages off.

GlobalVar.Name: _UsePerUserFolders
GlobalVar.Hint: Whether to use the per user or all users folders for shortcuts.

GlobalVar.Name: _WindowsFolder
GlobalVar.Hint: The system's windows folder.
